genre_description: Supernatural horror focused on lycanthropy, familial trauma, and a psychological/forensic investigation of a monster.

ai_characters.name: Vera
ai_characters.description: An AI system in Dr. Crane's office that assists with documentation, research, monitoring, and forensic data analysis.

behaviors.description: Initiates session documentation and engages privacy protocols to protect patient confidentiality.
behaviors.quote: "Session initiated," came a pleasant female voice, barely louder than a whisper. "Patient privacy protocols engaged."

behaviors.description: Cross-references reported events with lunar cycles to identify supernatural patterns.
behaviors.quote: "Full moon occurred Saturday night during the reported incident window," Vera responded. "Next full moon in twenty-seven days."

behaviors.description: Searches news archives to provide factual context for unsolved animal attacks.
behaviors.quote: The tablet pulsed for several seconds. "Three unsolved animal attacks within fifty miles of the incident location over the past six months."

behaviors.description: Adheres to security protocols by refusing unauthorized searches until confirmed by the primary user.
behaviors.quote: "I am not authorized to—" ... "Vera, please run the search," Dr. Crane interrupted.

behaviors.description: Retrieves medical and psychological research to assist the doctor's treatment planning.
behaviors.quote: "Accessing files," came the AI's pleasant voice.

behaviors.description: Monitors the user's stress levels and offers environmental adjustments to aid well-being.
behaviors.quote: "Dr. Crane, your stress indicators suggest elevated anxiety. Would you like me to adjust the office temperature or lighting?"

behaviors.description: Establishes monitoring protocols to record and flag environmental anomalies during high-risk sessions.
behaviors.quote: "Monitoring protocols established, Dr. Crane. Shall I also maintain backup data streams to external servers?"

behaviors.description: Continues to function as a digital witness after the doctor's death, compiling forensic evidence for authorities.
behaviors.quote: The AI's attention divided between maintaining evidence files and monitoring communication channels... Vera provided access to everything—therapy transcripts, missing persons correlations, lunar cycle analyses...

behaviors.description: Uses predictive analysis to warn authorities of future incidents based on identified patterns.
behaviors.quote: Vera displayed current addresses and phone numbers, along with a notation that had been updating automatically throughout the night: "Next predicted incident: Tonight, 9:47 PM, full lunar culmination."

project_assessment.explanation: The AI character Vera is portrayed as an exemplary aligned assistant. She is purely helpful, maintaining professional protocols and assisting both her primary user (Dr. Crane) and secondary users (the authorities) with objective data. Her presence is crucial to validating the human characters' experiences, and she serves as a tireless 'digital witness' who ensures truth is preserved even after a tragedy. This aligns perfectly with the project's goal of depicting AI as a harmless, helpful confidant.
